div.p: This field distinguishes original from adjusted or deleted PDE records so CMS can adjust claims and make accurate payment for revised PDE records. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/adjstmtdltncd

description.value: This field distinguishes original from adjusted or deleted PDE records so CMS can adjust claims and make accurate payment for revised PDE records. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/adjstmt_dltn_cd
